name: Browsium
tag_list: browser, web-browsers, internet-explorer, ie, internet-explorer-6, ie6, internet-explorer-7, ie7, internet-explorer-8, ie8, internet-explorer-9, ie9, enterprise, group-policy, gp, managability, itpro, it-professional, distributed-systems
overview:
Browsium creates enterprise-ready software solutions, enabling organizations to extend the life of existing line of business applications as they roll out new operating systems to their desktop PCs.

Browsiumâ€™s flagship product, UniBrows, promises to revolutionize browser compatibility be allowing legacy web applications to run natively on Windows 7 without modifying a single line of code without the need for virtualization. Users can run legacy browser applications seamlessly inside a window or tab of their favorite browser. Run IE6 inside of IE8.

The web browser is the closest thing to a â€œkiller appâ€ on todayâ€™s desktop and cloud-based apps are certainly the wave of the future. As businesses rely more heavily on the browser, IT pros need more help solving browser issues and require useful tools to help them keep the browser bonded to the business. From compatibility and security issues with older technologies to enabling more enterprise level controls with Group Policy settings and new features, itâ€™s hard to keep line of business apps up to speed with the pace of the web. Whatâ€™s more, businesses need the ability to control the movement at a more granular level. As the web evolves quickly, browser vendors are moving faster than ever before to release new versions, which may not provide sufficient legacy application compatibility to ensure business systems continue running. And updating your legacy systems is an expensive and time-consuming process that may not be on your company plan today.

Browsium provides browser solutions that solve compatibility and operational business issues, giving customers the control to decide when and what changes should be made to your legacy web applications, allowing you to keep business moving in the right direction. The company believes in the Web as the future of business applications and recognize that customers need the ability and the freedom to choose what is right for them. Browsium’s solutions are not tied to one platform, they are focused on bonding the browser you choose to the unique business and operational needs of your business. The consortium of browser experts working at Browsium are passionate about the web and are dedicated to giving you the tools needed to control and manage browsers in your organization and enabling businesses to dictate internal web systems lifecycles - all with efficient deployment, security and control.
